thread.title: For Valentine's Day, Twitter Imagines What The #WhiteHouseCandyHearts Say
thread.title_full: For Valentine's Day, Twitter Imagines What The #WhiteHouseCandyHearts Say

author: Andy McDonald
title: For Valentine's Day, Twitter Imagines What The #WhiteHouseCandyHearts Say
text:
For Valentine's Day, Twitter Imagines What The #WhiteHouseCandyHearts Say "Be Mein!" 02/14/2017 05:29 pm ET Andy McDonald Comedy Writer /   
Pro-tip: When you’re crying yourself to sleep on Valentine’s Day, wipe away your tears with candy hearts. The chalky texture will absorb tears faster than most other candies. 
Oh hey, speaking of crying and candy, for HuffPost Comedy’s latest hashtag game, we imagined what the #WhiteHouseCandyHearts have written on them, and it went pretty well. Here are some of the very best tweets. — Richard Jeter (@MilesToGo13) February 14, 2017 Pee my Valentine #WhiteHouseCandyHearts — Randi Mayem Singer (@rmayemsinger) February 14, 2017 Roses are red
